quotes: Cricket is not everything, not by any means, but it is a large part of who I am. Forget Fear and do something different for learnings.
author: -M Singh Dhoni

quotes: You can cut the tension with a cricket stump. It's special about amazing Cricket game and keep cricketers fit during play days.
author: -Murray Walker

quotes: No cricket team in the world depends on one or two players. The team always plays to win. Captaincy is just 'C' infront of your name.
author: -Virat Kohli Capt

quotes: Nothing is easy in cricket. Maybe when you watch it on TV, it looks easy. But it is not. You have to use your brain and time the ball.
author: -Rohit Sharma VC

quotes: The face of the team are the people who're playing on the cricket field. The team is not about one individual -Ex of team-family.
author: -Gautam Gambhir

quotes: Cricket is basically baseball on valium. Cricket involves mind and body working in tandem. It educates person to be great in real life
author: -Robin Williams
